category.name: Configuration.Linking
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_external_local_app_guid
preference.preference_description: Defines the GUID (general unique identifier) of the home application, in this case, of Teamcenter. When a link is created, the system submits its GUID to the remote application so a bi-directional link can be created. This preference is set by the system during the Remote workflow installation procedure. Valid Values: During the Remote workflow installation procedure, the GUID can be either manually entered or automatically generated by the system. Siemens PLM Software recommends autogenerating the GUID.
